name: Separating letters into upper and lower case
instruction:
Write a function called lettersDivider that takes a string of upper- and lower-case letters.

The function should return an array of two strings. The first line should contain all letters in lowercase and the second line should contain all letters in uppercase.

An example of a letter case check:
```javascript
let str = 'world';
console.log(str[0] === str[0].toLowerCase()); // true
```

An example of running the function:
```javascript
lettersDivider('HeLLOwoRLD'); // [ 'ewo', 'HLLORLD' ]
lettersDivider('www'); // [ 'www', '' ]
lettersDivider(''); // [ '', '' ]
```
